summary.p: The Śatapañcāśatka is a collection of hymns in praise of the Buddha. It had previously been known only through its Tibetan and Chinese translations, until a manuscript of the Sanskrit original was found in 1936. The text was critically edited and translated by D. R. Shackleton Bailey in 1951. It was re-issued as a digitally-printed paperback in 2009.
Of the material used in the edition, only witness A covers the full text.

lg.l: 12 svamāṃsāny api dattāni vastuṣv anyeṣu kā kathā |
prāṇair api tvayā sādhonāthā(cp. ) mānitaḥ praṇayī janaḥ ||
| nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na || dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal |
| legs mdzad khyod kyis srog kyang ni || slong ba'i skye bo rnams la btang |
內財尚能捨 何況於外財
尊無恪惜心 求者滿其願

body.p:
rgyu ni dbye ba drug ces bya ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu bstan te | de rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'i phyir ma bcol bar legs par mdzad pa dang
rgyu med bzhin du byams pa la sogs pa de ni bshad do || ji ltar zhe na | gang gi
phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thugs
rangs pa dang spu zing zhes byed pa dang bcas pa de'i phyir nyid kyi sha yang stsol
mdzad na zhes pa ni rgyas pa'o || nyid kyi sha...btang || de ltar byams pa'i stobs
byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis utpal sngon po dang 'dra
ba shin tu rno ba'i ral gris sha bcad cing gnod byin rnams la bza' ba'i phyir
btang ngo || nor bu gtsug can byang chub sems dpas kyang srin po rnams la btang
ngo zhes 138a bya ba ni rtogs pa brjod pa'o || dngos po gzhan= vastuṣv anyeṣu. zhes bya ba ni nor
bu dang gser dang dngul la sogs pa rnams so || smos ci 'tshal= kā kathā. zhes bya ba ni de smos
ci 'tshal te | don gyis go bas dngos po gzhan gyi sbyin pa rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes
dgongs pa'o || de ltar rang gi sha kho na btang ba yin nam zhe na | ma yin zhes
bshad pa | srog kyang= prāṇair api. ni zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o || srog ni srog rnams kyis
kyang ngo || btang= mānitaḥ. zhes bya ba ni mchod par gyur pa'o || slong ba'i skye bo rnams= prāṇayī janaḥ.
ni rnyed pa 'dod pas 'ongs pa'o || dper na ri bong du gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das
kyis slong mo pa'i gzugs can gcogtso ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i brgya byin 'ongs pa
des yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir me'i phung po la bzhag nasThe text seems to be incomplete. zhes pa
ni skyes rabs so || khyod ni ma bcol legslas(cp. v. II). mdzad pa | zhes bshad pa de nyid la brten
nas legslog mdzad= sādho. ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la bod pa'o |

lg.l: 17 parārthe tyajataḥ prāṇān yā prītir abhavat tava |
na sā naṣṭopalabdheṣu prāṇeṣuprāṇiṣu prāṇināṃ bhavet ||
| khyod kyis gzhan gyigyis don slad du || sku srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang |
| de 'dra srog chags 'gum pa las || bsos pa rnams la'ang byung'byung ma gyur |
殉命濟他難 生無量歡喜
如死忽重蘇 此喜過於彼

body.p:
| bzod pa'i gnas skabs gnyis pa bshad par bya ste | khyod kyis...ma gyur ||
gzhan gyi don gyi slad du sku srog btang nas zhes smos pa la | gzhan gyi don= parārthe. zhes
bya ba ni gzhan la phan pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro || btang ba= tyajataḥ. ni btang ba'o || sku srog= prāṇān.
ni srog go || dgyes pa= prītiḥ. ni khyod la thugs bde bar 140b gang gyur pa'o || ji ltar
klu gzhon nu dung gi gtsug phud can rim gyis 'ongs shing nye bar gnas pa la nam
kha'mkha' lding gis za barpar gyur pa gzigs nas de bskyab par bya ba'i phyir byang chub
sems dpar gyur pa gzhon nu sprin la zhon gyis nam kha'imkha'i lding la bdag nyid btang
ngo || de bzhin rgyal po zla 'od du gyur pas kyang rang gi mgo byin nas bram ze
drag po'i mig ces bya ba la mchod do || de 'drar ma gyur= na sā bhavet. ces bya ba ni dgyes
pa'o || 'gum pa las bsos pa rnams= naṣtopalabdheṣu. zhes bya ba ni sngar 'gum pa las phyi nas bsos
pa ste | snga ma'i duslus phyi ma'i dus kyis bsdus pa ni 'jig pa dang skye ba bzhin
no || srog la re ba med pa rnams kyis ji ltar na srog rnyed pa ni 'gum pa bsos
pa zhes bya ba'o || srog chags rnams kyi srog de ltar gyur pa de rnams kyi yang
de dang 'dra bar dgyesbgyes pa mi srid pa ji ltar gzhan gyi don gyi slad du khyod kyi
srog gtong ba zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to || de ltar na gnas skabs 'dir gshed
ma rnams kyi sdig pa bskyed pa ma spangs pas gshed ma rnams ni bzod pa
bskyed pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya bas na | khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa 'dod pa nyid kyi srog gis kyang mchod do zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
'dis bshad do |

lg.l: 27 akṛtverṣyāṃ viśiṣṭeṣu hīnān anavamatyaanavamanya ca |
agatvā sadṛśaiḥsadṛśaisadṛśe spardhāṃ tvaṃ loke śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ ||
| mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing || dma'idman la rngan chan mi mdzad la |
| myam la 'gran pa mi mnga' basma mchis pas || khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur |
尊無嫉姤心 於劣除輕想
平等無乖諍 勝行悉圓成

body.p:
|| da ni rnam pa gsum gyis 'bras bu la bstod pa las re zhig dpe med pa lalas
bstod pa de las kyang rgyu gang gis dpe med pa nyid dang | rnam pa gang gis dang |
gang dang bcas pas dpe med ces bya ste | dbye ba gsum mo || de la rgyu gang gis
dpe med pa nyid brnyes pa ni || mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing || zhes bya ba'i
tshigs su bcad pas de bshad par bya ste | mtho la...gyur || 'jig rten pa phal che
ba thos pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams
la phrag dog skye ste | gzhan gyi yon tan bzod mi nus pa zhes bya ba'i don to ||
dma'i ba rnams la rngan chan gyi blo dang | mnyam pa dang bcas pa la 'gran pa ni
phan tshun zil gyis gnon pa yin no || bcom ldan 'das kyang byang chub sems
dpa'i gnas skabs su mtho ba rnams la phrag dog ma mdzad de= viśiṣṭeṣv īrṣyāṃ nākarot. | yon tan kun tu
'dzin pa'i phyir ro || dma'i ba la rngan chan ma mdzad pa= hīnān nāvamanyata. ni | de rnams la yang
yon tan yang dag par stsal ba'i phyir ro || mnyam pa la 'gran pa mi mnga' ba= sadṛśaiḥ spardhāṃ na gataḥ. ni
nye bar 145a blangs pa'i yon tan rnams bstan par mdzad pa'i phyir ro || 'gran
pas= spardhām. ni bar chad du 'gyur zhes bya ba'o || rgyu gsum po de rnams kyis khyod= tvam.
ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi gtso bor gyur pa= loke śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ. ste | dpe med pa nyid
thob par gyur zhes bya ba'i don to |

lg.l: 58 sarvam evāviśeṣeṇaevāśeṣeṇa kleśair baddham idaṃ jagat |
tvaṃ jagatkleśamokṣārthaṃ baddhaḥ⟨(rthe yataḥ) karuṇayā ciram ||
| 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad ni || khyadkhyod med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings |
| khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dag || dgroldgril slad yun ring thugs rjes bsdams |
一切有情類 皆因煩惱持
唯佛能善除 由悲久住世

body.p:
|| sman pa mdzad pa ni dbye ba rnam pa brgyad de re zhig thugs rje la bstod pas
ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa mkhyen pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyang thugs rjes yun ring por
bzhugs pa dang | sems can rnams kyi de'i tshe shin tu sdug bsngal zhi bar bya
ba'i phyir skye bo mang po'i gnas su bzhugs pa dang dgon par mi bzhugs pa dang |
de ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal bzod spyod pa dang | bud med kyi spyod pa legs
pa dang mi legs pa dang 'dra ba'i thugs rje mnga' ba ste tshig gi don bzhi'o || de
la bcom ldan 'das kyis smon lam la brten pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar
du bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa sdug bsngal bzod spyod pa dang | 'khor ba'i
skye bo gzhan dang 'dra ba dang | rgyu la khyad par mi mnga' ba bshad par bya
ste | 'dro ba...bsdams || thams cad khyad med ces bya ba la | thams cad= sarvam. ces bya
ba ni khams gsum mo || khyad med= aviśeṣeṇa. ces bya ba ni lha rnams las dmyal ba'i bar
du'o || khyad med pas na nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bcings pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i
nges par ma spangs pa'i phyir ro || zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o || 'khor bar 'gro ba
nyon mongs par byed ces pas na nyon mongs pa rnams so= kleśāḥ. || de rnams kyis bcings= baddham. zhes
bya ba ni 'khor ba las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro || 'gro ba 'di= idaṃ jagat. zhes bya ba ni sems
can gyi 'jig rten 'di'o || de ltar na 'jig rten pa nyon mongs pa rnams 157b kyis
bcings pas 'khor bar nyon mongs par gyur to || khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa dag
dgrol slad= tvaṃ jagatkleśamokṣārtham. ces bya ba ni shes rab kyi mtshon chas 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa'i zhags
pa gcod pa'i phyir ro || yun rings thugs rjes bsdams= baddhaḥ karuṇayā ciram. zhes bya ba ni smon lam nas
brtsams te yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du'o |

lg.l: 64 parārthaikāntakalyāṇīkalyāṇi kāmaṃ svāśrayaniṣṭhurā |
tvayy eva kevalaṃ nātha karuṇākaruṇābhavatnātha karuṇā bhavet ||
| gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi || nyid kyi rtendon la brtse med pas |
| mgon po khyodkhyed nyid 'ba' zhig la || thugs rjes thugs rjerjes mdzad ma gyur |
當修利他行 會無自利心
慈念遍衆生 於己偏無愛

body.p:
| legs pa dang mi legs pa'i bud med kyi tshul dang mthun par bshad par bya ste |
gzhan gyi don...mdzad ma gyur || gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi zhes bya ba ni
rgyas pa'o || gzhan gyi don= parārtham. ni gzhan la sman pa mdzad pa'i phyir ro || rab tu
bzang ba= ekāntakalyāṇī. ni mkhas 159b pa'o || gi= kāmam. zhes bya ba ni zhal gyis bzhes pa la'o ||
nyid kyi rten la brtsertse med pa= niṣṭhurā. zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi rten= svāśrayaḥ.
te | de la brtse ba med pa= niṣṭhurā. ni rtsub pa dang gzir bar mdzad pa ste | thugs rjes= karuṇā. zhes
'chad par 'gyur ro || khyod nyid= tvayy eva. ni bcom ldan 'das la yin gyi gzhan la ni ma yin
no || 'ba' zhig= kevalam. ni bdag nyid che ba zhes bya ba'i don to || mgon po= nātha. zhes bya ba
ni bod pa'o || thugs rjes thugs rje mdzad ma gyur= karuṇākaruṇābhavat. zhes bya bas ni de ltar bstan pa
yin te | thugs rjes mdzad pa dang | rjes su bzung ba mdzad ces pa ni thugs rje'i don
dang mthun pa'i mtshan no || khyod kyi yul la thugs rje'i don dang mthun pa'i
mtshan du ma gyur to || de lta bas na nyid kyi rten la brtse ba mi mngah' ba dang |
gzhan la chags pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa des ni bud med kyi spyod pa mi legs
pa bshad do |

lg.l: 119 nopakārapare 'py evam upakāraparo janaḥ |
apakārapare 'pi tvam upakāraparo yathā ||
| ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgyid la || phan pa lhur mdzad de lta bur |
| skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la'ang || phan pa de ltar lhur mi bgyid |
恩深過覆載 背德起深怨
尊觀怨極境 猶如極重恩

body.p:
| da ni rnam pa gang gis dka' ba mdzad pa de bshad par bya ste | ji ltar...lhur
mi byid || phan pa lhur mdzad= upakārapare. ces bya ba ni bshad zin to || gnod bgyid la= apakārapare. zhes
bya ba ni zas gtsang ma la sogs pa 'ba' zhig la phan par mdzad par ma zad kyi
gnod par bgyid pa la gzhol ba lhas byin la sogs pa la yang ngo || khyod= tvam. ni bcom
ldan 'das so || ji ltar khyod phan paba lhur mdzad pa de bzhin du phan par byed
pa'i skye bo la skye boskye ba= janaḥ. ma yin no || ji ltar lhas byin zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan
'das kyi mched zla ste | skye ba gzhan du gnod pa bgyid pa'i smon lam btab pa
dang | rtag tu phan pa ma yin pa rtsol ba'o || bcom ldan 'das ni rtag tu phan par
mdzad pa dang | phan pa zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang ngoSkt. iti vihāraḥ! |
